guide.conclusion: This is very easy mod... especially if you have experience with a soldering iron. It's well worth it too as it's free. Manufacturers are making similar devices for $80 a pop.

guide.introduction: The Scala Rider G4 is an awesome device that allows you to answer phone calls, communicate with other motorcycle riders, listen to music or listen to the radio all while you are riding your motocycle. For those motorcycle riders who believe in protecting their ears with ear plugs while riding, it becomes very difficult to hear your G4 even at full volume. This guide will allow you to remove the helmet speakers and plug into the pre-existing 3.5mm jack with any earbuds you find most ocmfortable thus protecting your hearing and allowing you better fidelity. Don't worry though, I will show you a way to keep those helmet speakers in case you want to use them occassionally.
